entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
